original_title: Lakshman Nipuna Arachchi appointed to Anura’s MP seat
original_body_lines: The Election Commission has gazetted the name of Lakshman Nipuna Arachchi to fill the vacancy created in parliament following the election of Anura Kumara Dissanayake as the 9th executive President of Sri Lanka.
Accordingly, Lakshman Nipuna Arachchi has been appointed to the Parliament as a Colombo District MP of the National People’s Power (NPP).
He was next on the preference list for the district in 2020 General Elections after Anura Kumara Dissanayake.
